textBestBets.title: VA Health Home Page
textBestBets.description: Explore, access, and manage your VA benefits and health care.

textBestBets.title: CHAMPVA Benefits
textBestBets.description: CHAMPVA benefits cover the cost of health care for the spouse, surviving spouse, or child of a Veteran who has disabilities or who is deceased.
